ygData.subject: Human SK god and stats?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve have 2 TSK characters, but have tired of both because of the crushing EXP penalty, so I though I d try out a human SK.  A few questions: 1)  What is the
ygData.messageBody:
I've have 2 TSK characters, but have tired of both because of the crushing EXP penalty, so I though I'd try out a human SK. A few questions:

1) What is the best god for HSK? Innoruuk or Bertox? Which cities can each enter safely without having to kill anything? I'm assuming the human cities plus High Hold for both, plus Neriak for Innoruuk SK's. Can either safely enter a city on either Faydwer or Erudin?

2) Starting stats. I was thinking +5 Str and + 15 AGI to set each to 90. Any thoughts on what a good Str value is. Should I bump it to 100. How heavy is medium armor?

Thanks for any input.

Scragg Wraithbone (22nd TSK on Bristlebane)
Scregg Wraithbone (7th TSK on Mith. Marr)
